sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Typography, Container, Grid, IconButton } from '@mui/material';
import GitHubIcon from '@mui/icons-material/GitHub';
import LinkedInIcon from '@mui/icons-material/LinkedIn';
import TwitterIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Twitter';
import Pic from '../pic.jpg'; // Import the local image
import { motion } from 'framer-motion';

interface AuthorProps {
  darkMode: boolean;
}

const Author: React.FC<AuthorProps> = ({ darkMode }) => {
  const cardVariants = {
    hidden: { opacity: 0, y: 20 },
    visible: { opacity: 1, y: 0 },
  };

  const profileImageVariants = {
    animate: { y: [0, -5, 0], transition: { duration: 3, repeat: Infinity, ease: "easeInOut" } },
  };

  return (
    <Box
      sx={{
        flexGrow: 1,
        bgcolor: darkMode ? '#1a1a1a' : '#f5f5f5',
        minHeight: '100vh',
        color: darkMode ? '#e0e0e0' : '#333333',
        py: 8, // Add some vertical padding
        px: 2, // Add horizontal padding
      }}
    >
      <Container
        maxWidth="md"
        sx={{
          bgcolor: darkMode ? '#212121' : '#ffffff',
          p: { xs: 4, md: 6 }, // More padding on larger screens
          borderRadius: 3, // More rounded corners
          boxShadow: 6, // Stronger shadow
          textAlign: 'center',
        }}
      >
        <Box sx={{ mb: 6 }}>
          <motion.div variants={profileImageVariants} animate="animate">
            <Box
              component="img"
              src={Pic} // Use the imported local image
              alt="Subham Kumar"
              sx={{
                width: 180,
                height: 180,
                borderRadius: '50%',
                objectFit: 'cover',
                mb: 3,
                border: `5px solid ${darkMode ? '#424242' : '#e0e0e0'}`, // Thicker border
                boxShadow: 3, // Shadow on image
              }}
            />
          </motion.div>
          <Typography variant="h3" component="h1" gutterBottom sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#ffffff' : '#333333', fontWeight: 'bold' }}>
            Hi there! I'm Subham.
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="h6" paragraph sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#bdbdbd' : '#666666', fontStyle: 'italic' }}>
            I started building on the web in 2007 and never stopped.
          </Typography>
        </Box>

        <Box sx={{ mb: 6, maxWidth: '800px', mx: 'auto', textAlign: 'left' }}>
          <Typography variant="body1" paragraph sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#e0e0e0' : '#333333', lineHeight: 1.8 }}>
            I've worked in senior engineering positions at organizations like Gatsby (acq. Netlify), DigitalOcean, and Khan Academy. I've also taught web development fundamentals at Concordia University.
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body1" paragraph sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#e0e0e0' : '#333333', lineHeight: 1.8 }}>
            These days, I'm a solo indie hacker focused on empowering up-and-coming software developers.
          </Typography>
        </Box>

        <Typography variant="h4" sx={{ mt: 4, mb: 3, color: darkMode ? '#ffffff' : '#333333', fontWeight: 'bold', textAlign: 'left' }}>Work Experience</Typography>
        <Grid container spacing={3} sx={{ width: '100%', mb: 6 }}>
          <Grid item xs={12}>
            <motion.div variants={cardVariants} initial="hidden" animate="visible" whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }} viewport={{ once: true }} transition={{ duration: 0.6, delay: 0.1 }}>
              <Box sx={{ bgcolor: darkMode ? '#212121' : '#eeeeee', p: 3, borderRadius: 2, boxShadow: 3, borderLeft: `4px solid ${darkMode ? '#66bb6a' : '#4caf50'}` }}>
                <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#ffffff' : '#333333', fontWeight: 'medium' }}>Frontend Engineer Intern</Typography>
                <Typography variant="subtitle1" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#bdbdbd' : '#666666', fontStyle: 'italic', mb: 1 }}>at Sportthon</Typography>
                <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#e0e0e0' : '#333333', mb: 1 }}>Jan 2025 - March 2025</Typography>
                <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#e0e0e0' : '#333333', fontWeight: 'bold' }}>Tech Stack: React, CSS, RestAPI, MySQL</Typography>
              </Box>
            </motion.div>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12}>
            <motion.div variants={cardVariants} initial="hidden" animate="visible" whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }} viewport={{ once: true }} transition={{ duration: 0.6, delay: 0.2 }}>
              <Box sx={{ bgcolor: darkMode ? '#212121' : '#eeeeee', p: 3, borderRadius: 2, boxShadow: 3, borderLeft: `4px solid ${darkMode ? '#ffa726' : '#ff9800'}` }}>
                <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#ffffff' : '#333333', fontWeight: 'medium' }}>Open Source Contributor</Typography>
                <Typography variant="subtitle1" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#bdbdbd' : '#666666', fontStyle: 'italic', mb: 1 }}>Self-directed</Typography>
                <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#e0e0e0' : '#333333', mb: 1 }}>Dec 2023 - April 2024</Typography>
                <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#e0e0e0' : '#333333', fontWeight: 'bold' }}>Projects: Metamask, Circuitverse, OpenMRS</Typography>
              </Box>
            </motion.div>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12}>
            <motion.div variants={cardVariants} initial="hidden" animate="visible" whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }} viewport={{ once: true }} transition={{ duration: 0.6, delay: 0.3 }}>
              <Box sx={{ bgcolor: darkMode ? '#212121' : '#eeeeee', p: 3, borderRadius: 2, boxShadow: 3, borderLeft: `4px solid ${darkMode ? '#0288d1' : '#03a9f4'}` }}>
                <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#ffffff' : '#333333', fontWeight: 'medium' }}>Open Source Mentor</Typography>
                <Typography variant="subtitle1" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#bdbdbd' : '#666666', fontStyle: 'italic', mb: 1 }}>at Circuitverse</Typography>
                <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#e0e0e0' : '#333333', mb: 1 }}>May 2025 - August 2025</Typography>
              </Box>
            </motion.div>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>

        <Typography variant="h4" sx={{ mt: 4, mb: 3, color: darkMode ? '#ffffff' : '#333333', fontWeight: 'bold', textAlign: 'left' }}>Education</Typography>
         <motion.div variants={cardVariants} initial="hidden" animate="visible" whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }} viewport={{ once: true }} transition={{ duration: 0.6, delay: 0.4 }}>
          <Box sx={{ bgcolor: darkMode ? '#212121' : '#eeeeee', p: 3, borderRadius: 2, boxShadow: 3, width: '100%', mb: 6, borderLeft: `4px solid ${darkMode ? '#9575cd' : '#673ab7'}` }}>
            <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#ffffff' : '#333333', fontWeight: 'medium' }}>Integrated Master of Technology (B.Tech + M.Tech)</Typography>
            <Typography variant="subtitle1" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#bdbdbd' : '#666666', fontStyle: 'italic', mb: 1 }}>in Mathematics and Computing</Typography>
            <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#e0e0e0' : '#333333' }}>Dec 2021 - April 2026</Typography>
          </Box>
         </motion.div>

        <Typography variant="h4" sx={{ mt: 4, mb: 3, color: darkMode ? '#ffffff' : '#333333', fontWeight: 'bold', textAlign: 'center' }}>Find me on</Typography>
        <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center', mb: 6 }}>
          <IconButton href="https://github.com/yourusername" target="_blank" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#bdbdbd' : '#666666', '&:hover': { color: darkMode ? '#ffffff' : '#333333', transform: 'scale(1.2)' }, m: 1 }}>
            <GitHubIcon fontSize="large"/>
          </IconButton>
          <IconButton href="https://linkedin.com/in/yourusername" target="_blank" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#bdbdbd' : '#666666', '&:hover': { color: darkMode ? '#ffffff' : '#333333', transform: 'scale(1.2)' }, m: 1 }}>
            <LinkedInIcon fontSize="large"/>
          </IconButton>
          <IconButton href="https://twitter.com/yourusername" target="_blank" sx={{ color: darkMode ? '#bdbdbd' : '#666666', '&:hover': { color: darkMode ? '#ffffff' : '#333333', transform: 'scale(1.2)' }, m: 1 }}>
            <TwitterIcon fontSize="large"/>
          </IconButton>
        </Box>
      </Container>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Author;
